trans-unit.source: Acts as the top of a two-level named hierarchy of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection"></xref> collections.
trans-unit.target: Funge da parte superiore di una gerarchia denominata due livelli di <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> raccolte.

trans-unit.source: The RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection class is both a root-level <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection> collection and a container for a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: La classe RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection è sia un livello di radice <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>insieme e un contenitore per un <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: These collections allow you to create named groups of more <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection> collections, each containing individual named <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings> objects.
trans-unit.target: Queste raccolte consentono di creare gruppi denominati o più <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>raccolte, ogni singolo contenitore denominato <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettings> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the profile features added to [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], see [NIB: ASP.NET Profile Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/06a7bf4a-a5a2-462d-9793-c79063a2018d).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle funzionalità dei profili aggiunto a [!INCLUDE[vstecasplong](~/add/includes/vstecasplong-md.md)], vedere [NIB: proprietà di profilo ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/06a7bf4a-a5a2-462d-9793-c79063a2018d).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection.PropertySettings%2A> property is a RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection object that contains all the properties defined within the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection.PropertySettings%2A>proprietà è un oggetto RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection che contiene tutte le proprietà definite all'interno di `properties` sottosezione del `profile` sezione del file di configurazione.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileSection.PropertySettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> classe utilizzando le impostazioni predefinite.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection> property is a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection> object that contains all the properties defined within the `properties` subsection of the `profile` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection>proprietà è un <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection>oggetto che contiene tutte le proprietà definite all'interno di `properties` sottosezione del `profile` sezione del file di configurazione.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the default settings that are used for this constructor.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente mostra le impostazioni predefinite utilizzate per questo costruttore.

| Impostazione | Il valore predefinito | |-------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection.AllowClear%2A>| `True`.| | <xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection.GroupSettings%2A>| Un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection>. |</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection.GroupSettings%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection.AllowClear%2A>
Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Compares the current <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"></xref> object to another A <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Confronta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> A un altro oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> oggetto.
Override del metodo della classe base.
Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the passed <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"></xref> object is equal to the current object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto passato <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.RootProfilePropertySettingsCollection"> </xref> oggetto è uguale all'oggetto corrente; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Generates a hash code for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Genera un codice hash per la raccolta.
Override del metodo della classe base.

trans-unit.source: Unique integer hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash di tipo integer univoco per l'oggetto corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection"></xref> containing a collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettings"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection"> </xref> contenente una raccolta di <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettings"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The GroupSettings property allows you to create groups of <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection> collections.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà GroupSettings consente di creare gruppi di <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>raccolte.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProfilePropertySettingsCollection>
Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProfileGroupSettingsCollection"> </xref> insieme.
